name: Blob Blitz (joelkent01)
description:
Blob Blitz is a short action platformer, featuring mad dash movement and a child drawing's aesthetic. The goal of each level is to get from the start to the end. The whole game tracks your time, so figure out the most optimized routes and practice those quick inputs to get the fastest time!

This is my first game released on itch.io outside of a Game Jam. I hope you all enjoy it.

Credit to Kirby Weber for programming help with this game. Made in GameMaker 2 Studio.
